data.Name: Acid
data.Description: A reactive liquid with a low pH.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Alcohol
data.Description: A type of organic compound with at least one hydroxyl functional group (âˆ’OH) bound to a saturated carbon atom.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Cement
data.Description: A manufactured substance used to form a solid binder and sealer.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Detergent
data.Description: A surfactant with cleansing properties.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Dye
data.Description: A colored substance that chemically bonds to the substrate to which it is applied.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Fiber
data.Description: A natural or manufactured substance that is significantly longer than it is wide.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Hydrofluoric acid
data.Description: A mixture of hydrogen fluoride and water. It reacts with clays.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Liquid CO2
data.Description: Carbon dioxide under pressure in the liquid phase.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Methane sulfonic acid
data.Description: An acid for treating the matrix of carbonate reservoirs.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Polymer
data.Description: A synthetic gelling agent.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Solvent
data.Description: A substance that will dissolve a solid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Accelerator
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Accelerator" with Name="Accelerator" instead. A chemical that speeds up the rate of a reaction, especially in cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Anti Foam
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Antifoam" with Name="Antifoam" instead. A material that destabilizes a foam.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Anti gelation
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:AntiGelation" with Name="AntiGelation" instead. A substance that prevents or retards the formation of a gel.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Anti settling
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:AntiSettling" with Name="AntiSettling" instead. A substance that prevents or retards the gravity separation of a solid from a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Anti static
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Antistatic" with Name="Antistatic" instead. A substance that reduces or eliminates the buildup of static electricity.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Antifoam
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Antifoam" with Name="Antifoam" instead.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Bactericide
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Biocide" with Name="Biocide" instead. A product that kills bacteria in the water or on the surface of the pipe.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Bond accelerator
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:BondAccelerator" with Name="BondAccelerator" instead. A substance that reduces the reaction time for materials to bond together, especially in cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Bonding agent
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:BondingAgent" with Name="BondingAgent" instead. A substance that induces materials to bond together, especially in cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Corrosion inhibitor
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:CorrosionInhibitor" with Name="CorrosionInhibitor" instead. A substance to prevent or slow down the reaction of a metal with a fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Defoamer
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Defoamer" with Name="Defoamer" instead. A chemical that reduces the stability of the bubble skin in a foam and cause the foam to break.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Dispenser
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Dispersant" with Name="Dispersant" instead.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Dispersant
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Dispersant" with Name="Dispersant" instead. A substance that aids in breaking up a mass of particles, bubbles or droplets.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Emulsifier
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Emulsifier" with Name="Emulsifier" instead. A substance that creates or stabilizes an emulsion.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Expansion
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Expansion" with Name="Expansion" instead.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Extender
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Extender" with Name="Extender" instead. A substance that decreasing the density of a cement slurry.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Fe sequestering
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Chelant" with Name="Chelant" instead.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Flow enhancer
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:FlowEnhancer" with Name="FlowEnhancer" instead. A substance that improves the rate of flow of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Fluid loss
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:FluidLoss" with Name="FluidLoss" instead.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Foaming agent
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:FoamingAgent" with Name="FoamingAgent" instead. A substance that encourages an emulsion, being the suspension of a gas in a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Formation sealer
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:FormationSealer" with Name="FormationSealer" instead. A substance that improves the ability of a fluid to close a formation zone, thereby preventing lost circulation or improving zone abandonment.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Free water
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:FreeWaterControl" with Name="FreeWaterControl" instead. Water that is not in an emulsion or not chemically bonded.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Free water ctrl
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:FreeWaterControl" with Name="FreeWaterControl" instead. An additive to the cement slurry to address the potential problem of particle sedimentation.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Friction reducing
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:FrictionReducer" with Name="FrictionReducer" instead. A material, usually a polymer that reduces the friction of flowing fluid in a conduit
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gas migration
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:GasMigration" with Name="GasMigration" instead. Primarily used as an additive in a cement slurry
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Gelling agent
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Gellant" with Name="Gellant" instead. A substance that increases the viscosity of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Light Weight
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Lightweight" with Name="Lightweight" instead. A substance that decreasing the density of a cement slurry.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Liquid extender
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:LiquidExtender" with Name="LiquidExtender" instead. A substance that decreasing the density of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Lost circulation
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:LostCirculation" with Name="LostCirculation" instead.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Mixing fluid
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:MixingFluid" with Name="MixingFluid" instead.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Mutual solvent
data.Description: A chemical that have some common solvency for both water and oil materials.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Preflush
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Preflush" with Name="Preflush" instead. A substance to dissolve carbonate or to displace and isolate incompatible formation fluids.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Retarder
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Retarder" with Name="Retarder" instead. A chemical that slows a reaction, such as the set time of cement.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Retarder acc
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Retarder" with Name="Retarder" instead.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Scale inhibitor
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:ScaleInhibitor" with Name="ScaleInhibitor" instead. A substance that prevents the formation of iron scale.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Spacer
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Spacer" with Name="Spacer" instead. In the context of pumping, a spacer is a fluid used between two fluids to prevent contamination.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Stabilizer
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Stabilizer" with Name="Stabilizer" instead. A chemical or physical effect that prevents separation of two or more, normally immiscible phases.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Strength
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Surfactant
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Surfactant" with Name="Surfactant" instead. A chemical that modifies the surface tension of a liquid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Suspending agent
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:SuspendingAgent" with Name="SuspendingAgent" instead. A surfactant used in acid-treating solutions and fracturing fluids to suspend insoluble fines.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Thixotropic
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Thixotropic" with Name="Thixotropic" instead. A substance that changes the thixotropic property of a fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Viscosifier
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:Viscosifier" with Name="Viscosifier" instead. A substance that increases the viscosity of a fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Water sensitive
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:ClayStabilizer" with Name="ClayStabilizer" instead.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Weighting agent
data.Description: DEPRECATED: Please use Code="AdditiveRole:WeightingAgent" with Name="WeightingAgent" instead. A substance that increases the density of a fluid.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
